body_html: Can you isolate an input to tf.nn.softmax that produces the problematic values? It would be nice to have a simple test case that exhibits the problem. Does adding a tf.Print to the inputs give you a reproducible bad input?
body_text: Can you isolate an input to tf.nn.softmax that produces the problematic values?  It would be nice to have a simple test case that exhibits the problem.  Does adding a tf.Print to the inputs give you a reproducible bad input?
body: Can you isolate an input to `tf.nn.softmax` that produces the problematic values?  It would be nice to have a simple test case that exhibits the problem.  Does adding a `tf.Print` to the inputs give you a reproducible bad input?
